focusAreas.title: Education Access
focusAreas.blurb: Scholarships, safe classrooms, and mentorship for rural students to stay in school.
focusAreas.stat: 92% of SWAN scholars graduated secondary school last year.

focusAreas.title: Community Health
focusAreas.blurb: Mobile health camps and women’s wellness programs with trusted local nurses.
focusAreas.stat: 9,500+ medical consultations provided in remote districts.

focusAreas.title: Women’s Leadership
focusAreas.blurb: Micro-grants and trainings for women-led cooperatives focused on livelihoods.

hero.title: Because a student’s dream should never be out of reach.
hero.body: SWAN teams travel deep into rural Nepal to deliver scholarships, women-led cooperatives, and mobile health camps — all in partnership with the communities we serve.

items.title: Community owned
items.description: Programs are designed and audited with village committees so funding answers real priorities.

items.title: Data informed
items.description: We track attendance, graduation, and health outcomes to learn fast and adapt faster.

items.title: Lean operations
items.description: 90% of gifts go directly into programs thanks to a mostly volunteer leadership team.

cta.title: Join the SWAN collective
cta.body: Monthly donors fund emergency scholarships and keep health camps on the road year-round.

storiesPreview.title: Stories from the field
storiesPreview.body: See how communities are steering projects and changing what’s possible for the next generation.

partners.title: Trusted by local governments & global allies
